# isBidiControl

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the scalar is a format control character that has a specific function in the Unicode Bidirectional Algorithm.

## Declaration

```swift
var isBidiControl: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “Bidi_Control” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
title: isBidiControl
